Class YahooMediaSyndicationExtensionContext

Encapsulates specific information about an individual YahooMediaSyndicationExtension.

Implements

Categories

Gets a taxonomy that gives an indication of the type of content for this syndication entity.

Declaration
public Collection<YahooMediaCategory> Categories { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<YahooMediaCategory>

A System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<T> collection of YahooMediaCategory objects that represent a taxonomy that gives an indication to the type of content for this syndication entity. The default value is an empty collection.
| Improve this Doc View Source

Contents

Gets or sets the publishable media objects.

Declaration
public IEnumerable<YahooMediaContent> Contents { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<YahooMediaContent>

A System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T> collection of YahooMediaContent objects that represent publishable media objects.
Remarks

The sequence of YahooMediaContent objects within a syndication entity implies the order of presentation.

This System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T> collection of YahooMediaContent objects is internally represented as a System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<T> collection.

Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The value is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
| Improve this Doc View Source

Copyright

Gets or sets the copyright information for this syndication entity.

Declaration
public YahooMediaCopyright Copyright { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
YahooMediaCopyright

A YahooMediaCopyright that represents the copyright information for this syndication entity.
Remarks

If the media is operating under a Creative Commons license, a CreativeCommonsSyndicationExtension should be used instead.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Credits

Gets the entities that contributed to the creation of this syndication entity.

Declaration
public Collection<YahooMediaCredit> Credits { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<YahooMediaCredit>

A System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<T> collection of YahooMediaCredit objects that represent the entities that contributed to the creation of this syndication entity. The default value is an empty collection.
Remarks

Current entities can include people, companies, locations, etc. Specific entities can have multiple roles, and several entities can have the same role. These should appear as distinct YahooMediaCredit entities.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Description

Gets or sets the description of this syndication entity.

Declaration
public YahooMediaTextConstruct Description { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
YahooMediaTextConstruct

A YahooMediaTextConstruct that represents a short description of this syndication entity.
Remarks

Media object descriptions are typically a sentence in length.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Groups

Gets or sets the media objects that are effectively the same content, yet different representations.

Declaration
public IEnumerable<YahooMediaGroup> Groups { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<YahooMediaGroup>

A System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T> collection of YahooMediaGroup objects that represent effectively the same content, yet different representations.
Remarks

Media objects that are not the same content should not be included in the same YahooMediaGroup. The sequence of YahooMediaContent objects within a YahooMediaGroup implies the order of presentation.

This System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T> collection of YahooMediaGroup objects is internally represented as a System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<T> collection.

Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The value is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
| Improve this Doc View Source

Hashes

Gets the hash digests for this syndication entity.

Declaration
public Collection<YahooMediaHash> Hashes { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<YahooMediaHash>

A System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<T> collection of YahooMediaHash objects that represent the hash digests for this syndication entity. The default value is an empty collection.
Remarks

When assigning multiple hashes, each YahooMediaHash must have a different Algorithm.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Keywords

Gets the relevant keywords that describe this syndication entity.

Declaration
public Collection<string> Keywords { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<System.String>

A System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<T> collection of System.String objects that represent the relevant keywords that describe this syndication entity. The default value is an empty collection.
Remarks

Media objects are typically assigned maximum of ten keywords or phrases.

Ratings

Gets the permissible audiences for this syndication entity.

Declaration
public Collection<YahooMediaRating> Ratings { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<YahooMediaRating>

A System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<T> collection of YahooMediaRating objects that represent the permissible audiences for this syndication entity. The default value is an empty collection.
Remarks

If there are no ratings specified, it can be assumed that no restrictions are necessary.

Gets the restrictions to be placed on aggregators that are rendering this syndication entity.

Declaration

Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<YahooMediaRestriction>

A System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<T> collection of YahooMediaRestriction objects that represent restrictions to be placed on aggregators that are rendering this syndication entity. The default value is an empty collection.
| Improve this Doc View Source

TextSeries

Gets the text transcript, closed captioning, or lyrics for this syndication entity.

Declaration
public Collection<YahooMediaText> TextSeries { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<YahooMediaText>

A System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<T> collection of YahooMediaText objects that represent text transcript, closed captioning, or lyrics for this syndication entity. The default value is an empty collection.
Remarks

Many of these YahooMediaText objects are permitted to provide a time series of text. In such cases, it is encouraged, but not required, that the YahooMediaText objects be grouped by language and appear in time sequence order based on the start time. YahooMediaText objects can have overlapping start and end times.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Thumbnails

Gets the representative images for this syndication entity.

Declaration
public Collection<YahooMediaThumbnail> Thumbnails { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<YahooMediaThumbnail>

A System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<T> collection of YahooMediaThumbnail objects that represent images that are representative of this syndication entity. The default value is an empty collection.
Remarks

If multiple thumbnails are included, and time coding is not at play, it is assumed that the images are in order of importance.

| Improve this Doc View Source

YahooMediaTextConstruct

Declaration

Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator source

The System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager object used to resolve prefixed syndication extension elements and attributes.

Type Description

RemoveContent(YahooMediaContent)

Removes the supplied YahooMediaContent from the current instance's Contents collection.

Declaration
public bool RemoveContent(YahooMediaContent content)
Parameters
Type Name Description
YahooMediaContent content

The YahooMediaContent to be removed.
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

true if the YahooMediaContent was removed from the Contents collection, otherwise false.
Remarks

If the Contents collection of the current instance does not contain the specified YahooMediaContent, will return false.

Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The content is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
